name: Beachy Pong
description:
Beach volleyball twist on a classic.

Two-player Pong clone with a beach volley ball twist. Keyboard controls. First to 10.

Player 1 Controls

  • Up/Down: E/D
  • Serve Up: Z
  • Serve Down: X

Player 2 Controls

  • Up/Down: Up Arrow/Down Arrow
  • Serve Up: Z
  • Serve Down: X

Made in Pico-8
